log_levels.description: Available log levels: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL
log_levels.DEBUG: Detailed information, typically of interest only when diagnosing problems
log_levels.INFO: Confirmation that things are working as expected
log_levels.WARNING: An indication that something unexpected happened
log_levels.ERROR: A more serious problem, the software has not been able to perform some function
log_levels.CRITICAL: A serious error, the program itself may be unable to continue running
